column1: Croydon  Commercial  Gas  Co.,  ((1863)  15  CB  (NS)  568)  in  the  following

column2: "It appears to me that in construing a penal statute of any kind, we
are bound to take care that the party is brought strictly within it,
and to give no effect to it beyond what it is clear that the Legislature
intended. If there be any fair and legitimate doubt, the subject is not

column1: to  be  burthened.  Though  no  doubt

column2: distinction  between  penal  and  other  statutes  has,  in  this  respect,
